short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on allows to replace or update an existing bookmark title and/or URL with a minimal click count..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To update quickly a bookmark to last forum message or YouTube next video then it is your extension.
